title: the banning
body:
in the rank game, when u picked a champ to show u want to play this champ, and a ur bloody teammate just fking banned it for no reason and saying nothing in the chat, what would u do? and also if u got this happed in two games on a roll, would u be pissed and mad?
gg riot

replies.body: I would just play another champ. There are plenty to pick from...
